AIGN Framework

The AIGN Framework is an initiative developed and operated by Travel+Feel magazine publishing e.K., based in Munich, Germany. It aims to provide a governance framework for artificial intelligence.

Key Concepts:

  • Governance
  • Strategy
  • Competitive Advantage
  • Artificial Intelligence Governance
  • Regulatory Compliance
  • Trust and Reputation in AI
  • AI-Driven Decision Making
  • Risk Management in AI Development
AIGN Framework Artificial Intelligence Governance Network Travel+Feel magazine AIGN AI Regulation Reputation Trust Transparency Auditability
